remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表邏輯的資料行中控制項。The class represents a logical column in a control. 您可以擷取的資料行控制項的集合。You can retrieve columns through the collection of the control. 不同於，其中包含實際的集合中的資料格，主要用來調整的外觀和行為的資料行的使用者介面 (UI)，例如資料行寬度和儲存格樣式。Unlike a , which contains the actual collection of cells in a , is used mainly to adjust the appearance and behavior of the column user interface (UI), such as column width and cell style. 如需儲存格樣式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell styles, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 型別衍生自通常初始化相關類型的新執行個體的屬性衍生自類別。Types that derive from typically initialize the property to a new instance of a related type derived from the class. 與相關聯的外觀或行為個別儲存格的任何資料行屬性是對應的範本資料格屬性的包裝函式。Any column properties that relate to the appearance or behavior of individual cells are wrappers for the corresponding properties of the template cell. 變更其中一個屬性的資料行上會自動變更儲存格樣板和資料行中的所有資料格上的值。Changing one of these properties on the column automatically changes the value on the cell template and on all cells in the column. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立 Windows Form 和和一組按鈕。The following code example creates a Windows Form with a and a set of buttons. 每個按鈕標籤描述相關的作業屬性，例如交換的第一個和最後一個資料行 (使用屬性)，或變更資料行標頭的文字 (使用屬性)。Each button label describes an operation related to a property, such as swapping the first and last column (using the property) or changing the text of a column header (using the property). 按一下按鈕變更相關聯的屬性。Clicking a button changes the associated property of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料行的自動調整大小行為取決於值屬性，這是的值相同的以外的所有值的屬性，表示值繼承自屬性改為。The automatic sizing behavior of the column is determined by the value of the property, which is the same as the value of the property for all values except , which indicates that the value is inherited from the property instead. 當屬性值是，以及在該模式的其他資料行重新調整大小之資料行。When the property value is , the column is resized along with other columns in that mode. 在控制項中的所有填滿模式資料行分割可用空間比例取決於其屬性值。All fill-mode columns in the control divide the available space in proportions determined by their property values. 適用於填滿模式寬度取決於減去從用戶端區域控制項的寬度的所有資料行的寬度。The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control. 如果此寬度小於結合所有填滿模式資料行的值，會顯示水平捲軸、 最小寬度，以顯示所有填滿模式資料行和使用者資料行調整已停用。If this width is smaller than the combined values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled. 如需有關資料行填入模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料行填入模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 當屬性設定為以外的任何其他值，資料行要管理其寬度，使其儲存格的值完全顯示而不裁剪。When the property is set to any other value except , the column will manage its width so that its cell values are fully displayed without clipping. 在以內容為基礎的調整大小模式調整大小發生或儲存格內容變更時，啟用時，每當資料列高度變更時。In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if is enabled, whenever row heights change. 某些以內容為基礎的調整大小模式可讓您限制目前所顯示的資料列的大小調整，以提升效能。Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance. 只有包含資料行屬性值為`true`而調整大小，而且變更的資料行可見性不會進行調整大小。Only columns with a property value of `true` are resized, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur. 此外，當資料行自動調整設定，使用者將無法調整資料行寬度，使用滑鼠。Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse. 若要以程式設計方式調整資料行寬度，請使用控制項的或方法或一組資料行屬性。To adjust column widths programmatically, use the control's or methods or set the column property. 如需以內容為基礎的自動調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會強制資料行自動調整其寬度，以適合其內容。The following code example forces a column to automatically resize its width to fit its contents. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
